string-array.name: hechos_curiosos
string-array.item: Ants stretch when they wake up in the morning.
Ostriches can run faster than horses.
The gold medals from the Olympic Games are made of silver.
You were born with 300 bones, but by adulthood have only 206.
It takes about 8 minutes to get the sun to the earth.
Some bamboo plants can grow up to a meter a day.
The state of Florida is bigger than England.
Some penguins can jump 2–3 feet above.
